name: Void Analytics
title: voidanalytics.com
shortDescription: Void Analytics offers a cookie-free solution for tracking website metrics, adhering to GDPR, CCPA, and PECR. It's designed for businesses seeking compliance and privacy in data handling. Users can integrate it easily with existing tools like WordPress and Vue.JS, making it ideal for those transitioning from other platforms like Google Analytics.
pros: Fully compliant with major privacy regulations
Easy integration with existing tech stacks
No cookies or personal data collection
cons: No IP address tracking might limit location data
Potential learning curve for users new to analytics
